technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Soft tissue region demonstrates well-defined without fluid collection.
Major vessels show normal waveform on Doppler.
Uterus appears mildly thickened; endometrial thickness measures 1.68 mm.
Left kidney shows enlarged, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
Breast tissue shows coarse lesion measuring 22.77 mm.
Prostate is hypoechoic; volume approximately 8.5 cc.
Gallbladder shows ill-defined, no stones or wall thickening.
Placenta is hypoechoic and normally located.
recommendations: Refer to specialist for further evaluation.
